data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Export Document Invoice Item'
define view entity ZETR_DDL_I_EXPORT_INVI
  as select from    zetr_t_r102                    as invh
    inner join      ZETR_DDL_C_EXPORT_INVOICE_ITEM as InvoiceItem                on InvoiceItem.BillingDocument = invh.vbeln
    inner join      zetr_t_r103                    as invi                       on  invh.filen = invi.filen
                                                                                 and invh.vbeln = invi.vbeln
                                                                                 and invi.posnr = InvoiceItem.BillingDocumentItem

    left outer join I_BillingDocItemPartnerBasic   as BillingDocumentItemPartner on  BillingDocumentItemPartner.BillingDocument     = InvoiceItem.BillingDocument
                                                                                 and BillingDocumentItemPartner.BillingDocumentItem = InvoiceItem.BillingDocumentItem
                                                                                 and BillingDocumentItemPartner.PartnerFunction     = 'WE'


  //    left outer join I_DeliveryDocument             as DeliveryDocument on InvoiceItem.ReferenceSDDocumentItem = DeliveryDocument.DeliveryDocument
    left outer join I_Customer                     as Customer                   on Customer.Customer = BillingDocumentItemPartner.Customer
    inner join      ZETR_DDL_I_EXP_HEAD            as ExportHeader               on ExportHeader.Filen = invh.filen
    left outer join I_CompanyCode                  as _CompanyCode               on _CompanyCode.CompanyCode = ExportHeader.Bukrs
  association to parent ZETR_DDL_I_EXP_HEAD as _ExportFile on $projection.filen = _ExportFile.Filen
{
  key  invh.filen,
  key  invh.vbeln,
  key  InvoiceItem.BillingDocumentItem,
       InvoiceItem.HigherLevelItem,
       InvoiceItem.HigherLvlItmOfBatSpltItm,
       InvoiceItem.Product,
       InvoiceItem.BillingDocumentItemText,
       @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'BillingQuantityUnit'
       InvoiceItem.BillingQuantity,
       InvoiceItem.BillingQuantityUnit,
       InvoiceItem.TransactionCurrency,
       @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
       InvoiceItem.NetAmount,
       @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
       InvoiceItem.TaxAmount,
       InvoiceItem.Batch,
       InvoiceItem.Plant,
       InvoiceItem.PlantName,
       InvoiceItem.StorageLocation,
       InvoiceItem.StorageLocationName,
       InvoiceItem.ShippingPoint,
       InvoiceItem.ShippingPointName,
       InvoiceItem.ItemWeightUnit,
       InvoiceItem.ItemNetWeight,
       InvoiceItem.ItemVolumeUnit,
       InvoiceItem.ItemVolume,
       // InvoiceItem.wherl,
       //InvoiceItem.wherl_txt,
       // InvoiceItem.wstaw,
       InvoiceItem.SalesDocument,
       InvoiceItem.SalesDocumentItem,
       InvoiceItem.ReferenceSDDocument,
       InvoiceItem.ReferenceSDDocumentItem,
       BillingDocumentItemPartner.Customer as kunwe,
       Customer.CustomerFullName           as namwe,
       //       DeliveryDocument.ShipToParty as kunwe,
       //       Customer.OrganizationBPName1 as namwe,
       //       Customer.CustomerName,
       InvoiceItem.Subtotal1Amount,
       InvoiceItem.Subtotal2Amount,
       InvoiceItem.Subtotal3Amount,
       InvoiceItem.Subtotal4Amount,
       InvoiceItem.Subtotal5Amount,
       InvoiceItem.Subtotal6Amount,
       ExportHeader.Cedno                  as GCBNo,
       ExportHeader.Bukrs                  as CompanyCode,
       _CompanyCode.CompanyCodeName,

       ExportHeader.Descr,
       ExportHeader.CustomerName,
       @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'CustomerName' ]
       ExportHeader.Kunrg,
       ExportHeader.Bldat,
       ExportHeader.Erdat                  as erdat,
       ExportHeader.Clsed                  as clsed,

       _ExportFile
}
//where
// ExportHeader.isdeleted is initial
/*+[internal] {

],

],
